The correct answer is C: [00:06:36 - 00:07:11]. 

In this segment, the speaker talks about rolling out an application called 'Horizons' which aims to make innovation accessible to 26-27,000 people in 100 markets. The speaker also mentions that someone in a remote part of the network can access new innovations. This indicates that the discussion is about making innovation more widely available, hence the reference to 'making innovation mainstream'. Therefore, the relevant time segment for this discussion is from 00:06:36 to 00:07:11.
